name: Overlook
description:
Overlook is a short 5-10 minutes game that utilises a voice volume mechanism to help players control the in-game character, Blobbie. The game starts with you, the player, representing a disembodied voice that is conversing with Blobbie. Your aim is to assisting with Blobbie through navigating him through the entire game.

This was a project developed by a team of 4 students who took a game studies module in the National University of Singapore (NUS). The main aim of the game is to explore game-related theoretical issues, to discover and better understand them through developing a game.

Note: The game was made in the context of Singapore
